A p'aersyl elro is gnahecd. Lla fo itreh yilbtia essu rea efldrlei to xmuimam. r_of Pelaxem:_

wiki.article.standard.roleblock.title: Bclokloer
wiki.article.standard.roleblock.text: A epryla hwo is oclbekerdol hsa itreh tsvsii sereda. A p'aersyl tsvsii igneb sereda tnfeo amsen yteh t'cna ues itreh yilbtia. Emos eolsr rea mneumi ro ton afdeecft yb igneb oclbekerdol. Coerst nad Notthpsyi rea eolsr taht nca bclokloer trohe sylpaer nad rea ohbt mneumi to igneb oclbekerdol.
wiki.article.standard.ward.title: Wadr
wiki.article.standard.ward.text:
Sonomee nca be ddwrae. Naoney hwo tsvsii a epryla hwo is ddwrae hsa lla itreh tsvsii sereda nad vseeicre a thca agsemse sygani taht yteh rea dedbwkloacr. r_of _xlaepme:
- A urneboc teeslsc a epryla to wadr echa hgtni
- Hte ijlrao ptus a epryla in liaj, dnrgiwa meht.

 Emos eolsr rea blwaokdcr mneumi
- A jesret nca illk sonomee evne if h'ryete ddwrae
wiki.article.standard.block.title: Clbko
wiki.article.standard.block.text: A epryla hwo is kcdlobe swa eireth oclbekerdol, dedbwkloacr, ro ohbt. A epryla tnsi' kcdlobe if h'ryete mneumi
wiki.article.standard.jail.title: Liaj
wiki.article.standard.jail.text: A Ijlrao nca utp a epryla in liaj. Ewhn a epryla is in liaj, yteh nca tlak iwht hte Ijlrao ta hgtni, hte Ijlrao nca esooch to tceexeu meht, yteh t'cna etclse naoney. Hte ejdlai epryla is ddwrae, so mots astiiielb cntgai on meht afli, ianmgen itreh easf frmo mots kttaasc ro tiantvnseioigs.
wiki.article.standard.rampage.title: Gmarpea
wiki.article.standard.rampage.text: Lla itisvors to a aegrmdap epryla rea ielytidrnc ecdttaka. Hte gmarpea ashsre hte akactt eellv fo hte ngmripaga aterhcrca.
wiki.article.standard.possess.title: Ssoesps
wiki.article.standard.possess.text:
A epryla hwo is sspeodsse swa fecrdo nito iinvgtsi sonomee.
- Eolsr ikle Nmnoii, nad Isntitrotubrei, vhea hte yilbtia to ssoesps sylpaer
- Emos eolsr rea mneumi to igneb sspeodsse, ikle nmnoii, nad isntitrotubrei
- If a elro tsvsii iuptllme pleoep, oynl hte tfris isitv is gnahecd ewhn sspeodsse
- Yuo t'cna be sspeodsse nito sonomee if oury elro 'dosetn ollaw yuo to etclse meht. If a meumdi is sspeodsse, yteh sltil tond' isitv naoney

__Rfo Mep__lexa:

@1 hte atliigven teeslsc @7 in sophe fo nhoigtos meht.
Ewhn hgtni nesd @1 segt a agsemse sygani yteh rwee sspeodsse.
Hte txne tibayruo, yteh ese taht @2 swa tsho nastedi.
Hsit is escabeu @4 is hte nmnoii, hwo sspeodsse @1 nito nhoigtos @2.

wiki.article.standard.defense.title: Endeesf
wiki.article.standard.defense.text:
Kttaasc nad endeesf vhea 3 rteis echa. An akactt nca eireth be sbica, ircnaopmr-iegr, ro oorpg-inprcetictine.

A endeesf nca eireth be rmderao, eecoptrdt, ro ncnvlibeii.

A sbica akactt nca ton illk a epryla hwo is rmderao, nad an ircnaopmr-iegr akactt nca ton illk a epryla hwo is eecoptrdt. A oorpg-inprcetictine akactt nca eeorprowv omarr sa elwl sa oentpiorct.

 Emos eolsr vhea omarr yb ftealud, luluyas ievl ones. Oentpiorct nca be eatgrnd to sylpaer ghuorth astiiielb ikle hte So'trcod yilbtia to tcoterp itreh grteta. A epryla iwht ncnvlibeii endeesf nca oynl edi yb geitgnt tcxdueee ro avlinge hte aemg.

Lusnse hrisoewte eidtandci, kttaasc rea sbica yb ftealud nad lliw ton be ebal to illk sylpaer hwo rea rmderao ro eecoptrdt. Ircntide is ton a itre fo akactt.
wiki.article.standard.protect.title: Tcoterp
wiki.article.standard.protect.text: Tcoterp amsen to eircaens 'msoeenso endeesf to eecoptrdt. Hte oentpiorct lliw oynl stla hte hgtni lusnse hrisoewte eidtandci. A eecoptrdt epryla is oldt ewhn yteh rea ecdttaka utb vdesa yb oentpiorct
wiki.article.standard.dead.title: Ddae
wiki.article.standard.dead.text: If a epryla is ddae, yteh t'cna otev, itreh agerv lliw killye be in hte dvgyarrae, nad yteh luluyas t'cna ues itreh yilbtia rmnaeoy. Ddae sylpaer nca oynl apesk iwht trohe ddae sylpaer iwht hte xicteopen fo hte Meumdi nad sti grteta. A epryla desen to edi to ebmoec ddae. Lla sylpaer strat hte aemg ilvea! (Tahw did yuo etcepx…)
wiki.article.standard.silenced.title: Cdslneie
wiki.article.standard.silenced.text:
A epryla hwo is cdslneie nca ton tlak ro hrisoewte mmicctonaeu ngiurd taht yad.
- Yteh t'cna etnamnoi ngiurd hte niointnoam eshap escabeu yteh rea fecrdo to treiffo itreh otev
- Yteh nca sltil otev ngiurd hte dgtejunme eshap
- If hte cdslneie epryla is utp on tirla, yteh sltil t'cna tlak
- If hte sylpaer rea takglni otu ldou, cdslneie sylpaer lohusd ton apesk ro ues yan tepy fo tmcouincminoa, nguidciln slsangi ro afcali sipensoesxr. Hte rule is, fo a epryla t'cna ues thca, yteh rea ton odlewla to mmicctonaeu
- Eolsr ikle yueptd mraoy nad ijlrao nca sltil ues itreh astiiielb yrllonam ngiurd hte yad evne if cdslneie

 A Lbeiarkalcm nca lsnecei a epryla echa hgtni.
wiki.article.standard.friends.title: Ienfrds
wiki.article.standard.friends.text:
If 2 sylpaer nca win hte mase aemg, yteh rea ienfrds.
 - A jesret nca win in hte mase aemg sa a ditveetce, so yteh rea ienfrds
- An Tolpsea nca win in hte mase aemg sa a pidlisce so yteh rea ienfrds
- A eaotgdfhr t'cna win in hte mase aemg sa a ditveetce, yteh ohbt need hte trohe to osle, so yteh rea esnmiee
- A ieatternmo is ienfrds iwht a eperpuetp nad esnmiee iwht a meumdi
 Hte sipeplhhoor, ditveetce, nad ssigpo, nca ues itreh astiiielb to ese if pleoep rea ienfrds ro esnmiee, hahtogul sarau nca effcet htese rtselus.
wiki.article.standard.enemies.title: Esnmiee
wiki.article.standard.enemies.text:
If 2 sylpaer need hte trohe to osle in redro ofr etelehsmsv to win, yteh rea esnmiee.
- A Aplcoiniit t'cna win aeisondgl a mraoy, so yteh rea esnmiee.
- A eaotgdfhr t'cna win in hte mase aemg sa a ijlrao, so yteh rea esnmiee.
- A jesret nca win in hte mase aemg sa a ditveetce, so yteh rea ienfrds.
- An Tolpsea t'cna win iwht a eaotgdfhr, so yteh rea esnmiee.

 Hte sipeplhhoor, ditveetce, nad ssigpo, nca ues itreh astiiielb to ese if pleoep rea ienfrds ro esnmiee, hahtogul sarau nca effcet htese rtselus.
wiki.article.standard.haunt.title: Nauth
wiki.article.standard.haunt.text: Aetfr yteh edi, a Meumdi nca nauth a lvigni epryla to ollaw meht to mmicctonaeu iwht hte ddae ngiurd hte hgtni. Hte huentda epryla is ddeda to hte ddae thca roupg ta hgtni. If iuptllme umsmedi nauth iuptllme sylpaer, yteh nca lla apesk iwht echa trohe nad lla ddae sylpaer.
wiki.article.standard.transport.title: Artroptsn
wiki.article.standard.transport.text:
A naotreprtsr nca artroptsn sylpaer.
2 sylpaer hwo rea tdposnerart iwht echa trohe lliw vhea lla fo itreh itisvors pedpwas. So if a Ditveetce gsoe to isitv a epryla hos'w tdposnerart iwht nheorat epryla, tenh hte Ditveetce lliw laltuyac isitv hte trohe epryla.
wiki.article.standard.innocent.title: Eonnictn
wiki.article.standard.innocent.text:
Eonnictn hsa iuptllme sineangm.
- A urstel hte Ditveetce nca get luluyas tcndinaiig hte epryla yteh iitedvs is a nwoite.
- Nvoitg ofr sonomee to ton be tcxdueee ngiurd dgtejunme eshap. If ehrte rea eorm gyluti evsto athn eonnictn ones, hte epryla on tirla is tcxdueee.
wiki.article.standard.suspicious.title: Psisiucous
wiki.article.standard.suspicious.text: A urstel hte Ditveetce nca get luluyas tcndinaiig hte epryla yteh iitedvs is ievl.
wiki.article.standard.guilty.title: Gyluti
wiki.article.standard.guilty.text: A gyluti otev ngiurd hte dgtejunme eshap is a otev ofr hte epryla on tirla to be tcxdueee. If ehrte rea eorm Gyluti evsto athn Eonnictn evsto, hte epryla on tirla is tcxdueee.
wiki.article.standard.abstain.title: Bansait
wiki.article.standard.abstain.text: Tbninagisa is ewhn a epryla sdeo ton otev ngiurd a Nejdumtg eshap. If lla sylpaer Bansait, tenh hte epryla on tirla is ton tcxdueee.
wiki.article.standard.obscured.title: Coebudsr
wiki.article.standard.obscured.text: A epryla hwo is coebudsr dha itreh elro nad iblai sereda frmo hte dvgyarrae. A Oinamirtc nca gta sylpaer ofr ncsuorgbi, tenh ewhn yteh edi, yteh rea coebudsr.
wiki.article.standard.evil.title: Ievl
wiki.article.standard.evil.text: If a elro is ievl, it amsen a elro is wnntn-oo. A pchsicy nca ceeiver ievl vsnsiio to nelra hwo is ton on wont. A ditveetce lliw ese sonomee sa psisiucous if yteh rea ievl ro vhea a psisiucous uaar.
wiki.article.standard.roleLimit.title: Elro Lmiti
wiki.article.standard.roleLimit.text:
A eolsr lmiti is hte xmuimam nruebm fo taht elro taht nca be atedgrene ta hte strat fo a lurgaer aemg. If ehrte is on lmiti, ehrte nca be yan nruebm fo taht elro.
- Trnavee hsa a elro lmiti fo 1, ehrte nca oynl be eon trnavee, if 2 pleoep icaml trnavee, eon mtsu be lynig
- Rildwcad mtsu eraedh to elro lmiti
wiki.article.standard.douse.title: Oudes
wiki.article.standard.douse.text: Ssatsrnio nca oudes sylpaer, tenh retla gintie, to akactt eneeyrov hwo is eddsuo. If ehrte is an ntoairss ilvea tenh eddsuo sylpaer vhea a psisiucous uaar. Igiigtnn is an ircntide, oorpg-inprcetictine akactt to lla eddsuo sylpaer.
wiki.article.standard.backup.title: Ukpbac
wiki.article.standard.backup.text: Hte Eaotgdfhr nca esooch nheorat famai rmebme to be itreh ukpbac ta yan mtie. If hte Eaotgdfhr is oclbekerdol ro in liaj, hte ukpbac lliw akactt itreh eslteocni nastedi.
wiki.article.standard.marionette.title: Ieatternmo
wiki.article.standard.marionette.text: A epryla hwo is a ieatternmo hsa eenb nsrugt up yb hte Eperpuetp. Yteh ekep itreh dol elro, utb yteh wno win iwht niesfd. Yteh rea ecdttaka rveey hgtni yb lla eeuspterpp, if ehrte rea on eeuspterpp yteh rea sltil ecdttaka yb an elviibnis eperpuetp.
wiki.article.standard.aura.title: Uaar
wiki.article.standard.aura.text:
Sylpaer nca vhea an uaar taht ngahec hwo yteh earapp to tiaisevvgntie eolsr.
- A epryla iwht a psisiucous uaar is:
    - Psisiucous to a Ditveetce
    - Esnmiee iwht eneeyrov to hte sipeplhhoor
    - Envre in hte ispyschc odgo vinosi
    - Esnmiee iwht oury grteta to hte ssigpo
    - Envre a nwoite to hte poosn
- A epryla iwht an eonnictn uaar is:
    - Eonnictn to hte ditveetce
    - Ienfrds iwht eneeyrov to hte sipeplhhoor
    - Ienfrds iwht oury grteta to hte ssigpo
    - Envre in hte ispyschc ievl vinosi

 Emos eolsr vhea an uaar yb ftealud
r_of _xlaepme
- Hte eaotgdfhr hsa an eonnictn uaar yb ftealud
- Hte wfewlore hsa an eonnictn uaar on emos igtshn

 If a epryla hsa ohbt an eonnictn nad psisiucous uaar ta hte mase mtie, hte psisiucous uaar *luluyas* resrdevoi.
- Hte ditveetce eess meht sa psisiucous
- Hte sipeplhhoor eess meht sa esnmiee
- Hte pchsicy t'cna ese meht in yan vinosi
- Yteh t'cna esgriter to hte poosn
- Yteh rea esnmiee iwht oury grteta to hte ssigpo
wiki.article.standard.appearedVisit.text:
A epryla dulco _apreap_ to vhea iitedvs sonomee, evne hoguht yteh dtind'. Hsit is luluyas ucdsea yb ievl eolsr shuc sa Rfearm.

Hsit oynl ffecsat tiaisevvgntie eolsr.

_El_apxesm

Hte Krtacer nad Oolukot nca ese hte apeardep isitv, utb ton hte elar isitv.

A Trnavee 'dosetn akactt a epryla hwo apeardep to isitv meht nad dtind' laltuyac isitv meht.
wiki.article.standard.roleOutline.title: Elro Utlneio
wiki.article.standard.roleOutline.text:
A elro utlneio esnedif a roupg fo eolsr.

Etinluso nca eireth be a nferiepdde elro set, an cxate elro, ro a niuno fo iuptllme.

_El_apxesm

"Yan" It dulco be yan elro

"Etnlaur" Dulco be yan losesbip etnlaur elro.

"Wont Toupsrp" Dulco be an Coerst, Isntitrotubrei, Naotreprtsr, ro Meumdi

"Eaotgdfhr" Dulco oynl be a Eaotgdfhr.

"Rildwcad ∪ Pchsicy" Dulco eireth be an Rildwcad ro Pchsicy.

- Ewhn eolsr rea atedgrene aodlnrym frmo a elro utlneio, echa losesbip elro is qyelalu killye to ertenaeg.
- Elro etinluso rea edus in hte utlneio ltsi to whos tahw eolsr dulco be in hte aemg.
wiki.article.standard.outlineList.title: Utlneio Ltsi
wiki.article.standard.outlineList.text: Hte utlneio ltsi esnedif tahw eolsr rea in hte aemg. Ta hte strat fo a aemg, echa epryla segt gisanesd to a elro utlneio. Tenh, itreh elro is atedgrene aodlnrym frmo taht elro utlneio.
wiki.article.standard.chatGroup.title: Thca Roupg
wiki.article.standard.chatGroup.text:
Lla mgesssae rea eireth atiperv ro tsen eon fo htese thca rgousp
 - Lla 🔊 (Hte nico 'dosetn lsipday txne to mgesssae, Yuo rea odlewla to apesk otu ldou if yuo nca esdn to "Lla" thca)

wiki.article.standard.fastForward.title: Tsaf Roawfrd
wiki.article.standard.fastForward.text: If lla lvigni sylpaer otev to tsaf roawfrd, hte rtrecnu eshap ntitnlyas nesd. Nvoitg to tsaf roawfrd is ypcoemellt snomnuyoa, bnyood evne knwos ewhn yuo resps hte toubtn. To otev to tsaf roawfrd, resps hte tsaf roawfrd toubtn in hte tpo elft.
wiki.article.standard.forfeitVote.title: Treiffo Otev
wiki.article.standard.forfeitVote.text:
Rnioffgite oury otev amsen yuo rea ton ebal to otev ngiurd hte niointnoam eshap utb yuo nca sltil otev ngiurd hte dgtejunme eshap. Ngiurd cudossnsii, sylpaer nca esooch to treiffo itreh otev singu hte toubtn ta hte tpo fo hte tlsryaplie. Cone Niointnoam arstst, yteh t'cna ngahec itreh mdni.
- Eneeyrov senrla hwo dirfeetfo itreh otev ewhn niointnoam arstst in hte ofmr fo a gta
- Ofr echa epryla hwo fsrtfieo itreh otev, hte nuomat fo evsto enedde ofr a tirla saceresde cgylcandroi
- Sylpaer hwo rea cdslneie rea fecrdo to treiffo itreh otev

 It is lgtnsoyr eemcmddorne to envre erve treiffo oury otev lusnse yuo rea cdslneie ro pnditeenrg to be cdslneie
wiki.article.standard.loveLinked.title: Loev Dlneik
wiki.article.standard.loveLinked.text: 2 sylpaer hwo rea loev dlneik rea oldt hwo echa trohe rea. If eon ieds, hte trohe ieds fo a krebon heatr. Cuidp loev inkl sylpaer.
wiki.article.standard.howToPlay.title: Hwo To Lypa
wiki.article.standard.howToPlay.text:
Hte gloa fo hte aemg deedpns on oury elro. Mots eolsr win if lla sylpaer frmo psognopi smtae rea mdeianliet
Hte smtae rea Wont, Famai, Tucl, Niesfd
- Wont lohusd try to dnfi otu hwo hte famai is in redro to otev meht otu
- Famai, tucl, nad niesfd, lohusd try to atsy ehdndi heilw niilkgl sntewio

Hte aemg rsnu in essaph fo yad nad hgtni
- Ngiurd hgtni, echa epryla essu itreh eolsr astiiielb
- Ngiurd hte yad, sylpaer siudssc ifnmnoioatr yteh ednelra nad otev on a epryla to illk

Ehrte rea sspbauehs wntihi yad nad hgtni

# Hgtni
Mots elro astiiielb work ta hgtni. Ereh rea emos elasxepm
- Echa hgtni, hte eaotgdfhr nca etclse a epryla to illk meht
- Echa hgtni, hte ditveetce nca etclse a epryla. Hte ditveetce is oldt if hte epryla yteh etclse is eonnictn ro psisiucous. Hsit uwold leph hte ditveetce dnfi otu hwo hte famai is. If yteh rea psisiucous yteh rea ton a nwoite
- Echa hgtni, hte rfearm nca etclse a epryla to maek meht esgriter aflelys to hte ditveetce. So a nwoite dulco esgriter sa psisiucous to a ditveetce aflelys if a rfearm edus itreh yilbtia

# Tibayruo
Ngiurd hte tibayruo eshap, eneeyrov is oldt hwo died, longa iwht hte elro nad iblai fo sheto hwo died.
Lla sylpaer lohusd ekep itreh iblai toen apge to ekep ckrta fo lla hte ifnmnoioatr yteh ednelra ngiurd hte aemg. Hte tibayruo eshap is a pcrefet mtie to reiwt onwd in oury iblai tahw yuo ednelra stla hgtni. Ofr pelaxem:

- If oyru'e a ditveetce hwo ednelra taht @5 is psisiucous on hgtni 1. Yuo dulco reiwt oury iblai to lkoo ikle hsit

Ditveetce
Hgtni 1: @5 - psisiucous

It is saol mntoripat ofr nno nwoite sylpaer to ekep a afek iblai to nreepdt taht yteh rea a nwoite

# Cudossnsii
Hte cudossnsii eshap is eewhr sylpaer siudssc hte ifnmnoioatr yteh ednelra nad try to dnfi otu hwo hte famai, niesfd, nad tucl rea
Sylpaer lliw ska echa trohe to icaml, hsit amsen yteh ntwa to kwno hte ifnmnoioatr taht hte trohe epryla ednelra
Mots sylpaer esdn itreh iblai in thca ngiurd hsit eshap, to hasre hte ifnmnoioatr tyenecliiff in nsorseep to igneb dkase to icaml. It lliw killye be sdcoeirdne psisiucous to ton vhea an iblai perepdra ewhn dkase ofr eon. So sti vrye mntoripat to vhea eon perepdra, on mtaetr hwo yuo rea

# Niointnoam
Ngiurd niointnoam, sylpaer nca otev trohe sylpaer on to tirla in redro to tceexeu meht
Hte tesb wya ofr sntewio to illk famai emrbmes is to ues itreh otev, evne if yuo nrea’t cteiarn sonomee is ievl, nvoitg meht ootn tirla nad heeagnttirn meht lliw tnfeo eivg ifnmnoioatr to leph dnfi famai
- If eorm athn lafh fo hte lvigni sylpaer otev ofr eon epryla, taht epryla is utp on tirla
- If ehrte nrea’t ghoune evsto in mtie, hte aemg pssik iyrdeltc to dsuk

# Yenoimtst
